document.full_text: bp's plan to gain a foothold in russia's offshore arctic oilfields through a deal with state-controlled rosneft has collapsed, opening the way for other oil groups to try to fill its place.
document.title: bp's arctic oil deal with rosneft collapses
lines_and_colors: bp's plan to gain a foothold in russia's offshore arctic oilfields through a deal with state-controlled rosneft has collapsed, opening the way for other oil groups to try to fill its place.
